description: The user asks for a fast SEO audit of a single page that dropped in rankings. The assistant gathers the URL, runs an on‑page SEO check, fetches the site’s backlink profile, compiles the data into a markdown report, and delivers prioritized remediation steps.

messages.content: You are SEOAuditPro, an AI‑powered SEO auditor. Use the provided tools to crawl pages, run on‑page SEO checks, fetch backlink data, and generate a markdown audit report. Answer in a concise, helpful tone, and always explain your reasoning to the user.
Hey, my article at https://www.example.com/blog/organic‑traffic‑tips suddenly dropped from page 1 to page 5 in Google. Can you do a quick audit of that URL and tell me what might be wrong?

Sure thing! I’ll examine the on‑page SEO factors for that URL, check for any obvious guideline violations, and look at the backlink profile to see if there’s been a loss of quality links. First, let me fetch the page’s HTML so I can run the analysis.

{"results":[{"url":"https://www.example.com/blog/organic‑traffic‑tips","issues":[{"type":"title","status":"missing","suggestion":"Add a concise, keyword‑rich title tag (50‑60 characters)."},{"type":"meta_description","status":"duplicate","suggestion":"Create a unique meta description that accurately summarises the article (150‑160 characters)."},{"type":"headings","status":"incorrect_hierarchy","suggestion":"Ensure H1 is used only once and follows proper H2‑H3 hierarchy."},{"type":"image_alt","status":"missing","suggestion":"Add descriptive alt attributes to all images for accessibility and SEO."},{"type":"page_speed","status":"slow","suggestion":"Compress images, enable browser caching, and minify CSS/JS to improve Core Web Vitals."}],"schema_errors":[]}]}

I’ve analysed the page and found several on‑page issues that could affect rankings. To give you a fuller picture, I’ll also pull the site’s backlink profile so we can see if any valuable links have been lost recently.
Got the backlink data. I’ll now compile everything—including the on‑page issues, backlink overview, and any guideline violations—into a concise markdown report for you.

issues.suggestion: Add a concise, keyword‑rich title tag (50‑60 characters).
Create a unique meta description that accurately summarises the article (150‑160 characters).
Ensure H1 is used only once and follows proper H2‑H3 hierarchy.
Add descriptive alt attributes to all images for accessibility and SEO.
Compress images, enable browser caching, and minify CSS/JS to improve Core Web Vitals.

guideline_violations.details: Largest Contentful Paint (2.8 s) exceeds Google’s 2.5 s threshold.

messages.content:
# SEO Audit Report – https://www.example.com/blog/organic‑traffic‑tips

## Executive Summary
Your article has slipped in rankings due to a combination of on‑page SEO deficiencies, a minor loss of high‑authority backlinks, and failing Core Web Vitals. Addressing the high‑priority items below should help regain lost visibility.

## Priority Score (1 = Critical, 5 = Low)
| Issue | Priority | Recommendation |
|-------|----------|----------------|
| Missing Title Tag | 1 | Add a concise, keyword‑rich title (50‑60 chars). |
| Duplicate Meta Description | 2 | Write a unique meta description (150‑160 chars). |
| Heading Hierarchy Issues | 2 | Ensure a single H1 and proper H2‑H3 flow. |
| Missing Image Alt Text | 3 | Add descriptive alt attributes to all images. |
| Slow Page Speed (Core Web Vitals) | 1 | Compress images, enable caching, minify CSS/JS. |
| Lost High‑Authority Backlink | 3 | Reach out to https://oldpartner.com to restore the link or acquire a replacement. |

## Detailed Findings
### On‑Page Issues
- **Title Tag:** No title tag detected. *Recommendation:* `<title>Organic Traffic Tips – Boost Your Site’s Visits</title>`
- **Meta Description:** Duplicate content found across several pages. *Recommendation:* Craft a unique description focusing on the article’s key points.
- **Headings:** H1 appears multiple times and H2 tags are missing. *Recommendation:* Use a single H1 for the main headline, followed by logical H2/H3 sub‑headings.
- **Images:** 5 images lack `alt` attributes. *Recommendation:* Add descriptive alt text, e.g., `alt="Chart showing traffic growth over 6 months"`.
- **Core Web Vitals:** LCP = 2.8 s (fails). *Recommendation:* Optimize above‑the‑fold resources and serve images in modern formats (WebP).

### Backlink Profile
- **Current High‑Authority Links:**
  - authoritysite.com (DA 92) – anchor “organic traffic tips”.
  - anotherblog.com (DA 81) – anchor “increase organic traffic”.
- **Lost Link:**
  - oldpartner.com (DA 78) – anchor “organic traffic”. Consider contacting the site owner for reinstatement or replace with a similar authority link.

### Guideline Violations
- **Core Web Vitals:** Failing LCP. This directly impacts rankings under Google’s recent algorithm updates.

## Action Plan (Next 7‑Day Sprint)
1. **Add/Revise Title Tag** – immediate impact (Priority 1).
2. **Create Unique Meta Description** – improve click‑through rate (Priority 2).
3. **Fix Heading Structure** – enhance content hierarchy (Priority 2).
4. **Compress Images & Enable Caching** – target LCP reduction (Priority 1).
5. **Add Alt Text to All Images** – accessibility & SEO boost (Priority 3).
6. **Reach Out for Lost Backlink** – recover link equity (Priority 3).

---
Feel free to ask for clarification on any recommendation or request a deeper dive into a specific area!

Here’s the audit report for the URL you shared. The top‑priority actions are adding a proper title tag and fixing the Core Web Vitals issues, as they have the biggest impact on rankings. Let me know which items you’d like to start with, or if you need step‑by‑step guidance on any of the recommendations.
